Load functions.

```{r}
source('readFormula.R')
source('predFerm.R')
```

Show arguments.

```{r}
args(predFerm)
```

Example calls.

1. Glucose to ethanol (section 5.6.1 in R & M)

```{r}
predFerm(donor = 'C6H10O5', acceptor = 'CH3CH2OH')
```

```{r}
predFerm(donor = 'C6H10O5', acceptor = 'CH3CH2OH', fs = 0.22)
```

2. Glucose to lactic acid 

```{r}
predFerm(donor = 'C6H10O5', acceptor = 'C3H6O3', fs = 0.1)
```

3. Lipids to acetic acid

```{r}
predFerm(donor = 'C57H104O6', acceptor = 'CH3COOH', fs = 0.1)
```

4. Citrate to two products (Example 5.6 in R & M)

```{r}
predFerm(donor = 'COOHCH2COHCOOHCH2COOH', acceptor = 'HCOOH(H3CCOOH)2')
```
